0.title: Mihoyo Linking commands!
0.description:
Main linking channel set is <#889200292418187316>!
Type like this to link your account ```eu: 6457129818
asia: 6457129818
na: 6457129818```

fields.name: !glink (server) (uid)
fields.value: Links your genshin impact account of specified server!

fields.name: !gchar (server)
fields.value: Shows owned | claimed characters of your genshin impact game

fields.name: !gstats (server)
fields.value: Shows the statistics of your genshin impact account of specified region!

fields.name: !gserv
fields.value: Shows your linked accounts with servers!

1.title: Quests commands!
1.description: Quests command, to show quest walkthrough and other stuff!

fields.name: !chapter (chapter name)
fields.value: Chapter name is optional, if specified without name it will show all chapters with it **acts and rewards!**

fields.name: !act (act name)
fields.value: Act name is optional, if specified without name it will show all acts with it **quests and rewards!**

fields.name: !quest (quest name)
fields.value: Quest name is optional, if specified without name it will show all quests else it will show quest **details** , **walkthrough**!

2.title: Fun commands!
2.description: Fun commands, cuz I have nothing to do!

fields.name: !pq
fields.value: Shows random paimon quote!

fields.name: !psb
fields.value: Shows available paimon sounds, reacting to a sound will play that sound in voice channel!

fields.name: !anime (anime name)
fields.value: Shows anime details of specified anime!

fields.name: !map
fields.value: Shows map of Tevyat!

3.title: Build guides command!
3.description: Shows build and ascension guides for characters!

fields.name: !b (character name)
fields.value: shows builds from specified character!

fields.name: !as (character mention)
fields.value: shows ascension mats and talents from specified character!

4.title: Lobbies command!
4.description: Private Lobbies command! Lobbies are private by default!

fields.name: !lc
fields.value: Creates your custom private lobby!

fields.name: !la (user mention)
fields.value: Allows user to join your vc!

fields.name: !lua (user mention)
fields.value: Prevents user from joining your vc! Note this will not kick the user if he has already joined!

fields.name: !lk (user mention)
fields.value: Kicks user from the vc!

fields.name: !lul
fields.value: Makes your vc public so everyone can join the vc!

fields.name: !llock
fields.value: Makes your vc private!

fields.name: !ll (number)
fields.value: Limits your lobby to number of user!

fields.name: !scrutiny (off|on)
fields.value: Enables or disables scrutiny for members, if on, they would have to verify themselves in a channel!

fields.name: !approve (user mention)
fields.value: Verifies the user!
